name: digital-marketing-pro
description: Comprehensive digital marketing execution system with 18 specialist agents, brand guidelines enforcement, adaptive scoring, MCP integrations for your own marketing accounts, and persistent campaign memory. 16 integrated modules covering strategy, execution, and measurement across all channels, business models, and industries. Full execution layer: publish blogs, send email campaigns, launch ad campaigns, schedule social posts, sync CRM data, manage persistent memory via RAG, send SMS/WhatsApp, and deliver reports â€” all with human-in-the-loop approval workflow. Agency operations: multi-client credential profiles, portfolio dashboards, SOPs, team management. 68 slash commands for direct workflow access. 124 reference knowledge files powering deep domain expertise. Agents call 42 Python scripts for deterministic scoring, query 46 MCP servers for live data and execution, enforce brand guidelines, and persist campaign learnings across sessions via vector databases and knowledge graphs.

author.name: Indranil Banerjee
author.title: Head of AI Transformation & Group Lead - Digital Marketing
